oai_dc:dc.dc:title: A new Tc-99m labeled porphyrin for specific imaging of Sarcoma 120: Synthesis and biological study in a Swiss mouse model
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: SHETTY, SJ
MURUGESAN, S
CHATTERJEE, SR
BANERJEE, S
SRIVASTAVA, TS
NORONHA, OPD
SAMUEL, AM
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: hematoporphyrin
tc-99m
porphyrin
tumour
radioscintigraphy
cancer detection
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A new porphyrin meso-5,10,15,20-tetrakis[3,4-bis(carboxymethyleneoxy- phenyl]porphyrin (T3,4BCPP) was synthesised and efficiently labeled with Tc-99m. On injecting this Tc-99m labeled porphyrin to abdominal Sarcoma 120 bearing Swiss mice it accumulated in the abdominal tumour. This radiolabeled complex can thus be used for tumour detection and diagnosis.
